page.description: Loads CSS from a file. If the flagForeLoad argument is true then the CSS file is loaded even if it has been previously loaded. The default value for flagForceLoad is false.

argument.name: CSSFilename
argument.description: The CSS filename to be loaded.

argument.name: flagForceLoad
argument.description: Logical, true = load files even if they have already been loaded.

section.title: Example
section.description: mycss.css is loaded from the same folder in the webroot as the current component.
